alert.note: Alert for Hinds (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 8:34PM CDT until June 19 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN RANKIN AND SOUTHEASTERN HINDS COUNTIES... At 834 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Byram, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Richland and Florence around 845 PM CDT. Pearl around 850 PM CDT. Flowood and Monterey around 855 PM CDT. Brandon around 905 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
